channel.title: ArmyPkz-2007RS Bringing back those good day's! *PI*
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/20zrame.png[/img][/center]
[center]Hello guy's it's Cody here and I want to bring my old server back!!!! I had this server up about 2 months ago and it got roughly 200 registered in 36 hours. So id like to bring it back but i need your guy's help!!! [/center]
[center]My server is a 317 PI and what I hope to achieve in this server is happy player's. I have done most of the coding in it from when it was up earlier, but we could still find some stuff to fix, all of the skills do work atm. Also if we get any donations I will be spending it on our VPS and a .com domain four OUR server.[/center]
Media: Home! [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/709f7r.png[/img]
Training! [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2e5qkya.png[/img]
Bosses! [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/1zr17oo.png[/img]
Donor! [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/10ehlb4.png[/img]
[center]Ok guy's so what I need to complete putting my server on line is One Coder 0/1 And One Hoster 0/1
So thanks so much guy's if you want to help out here is the application format!
Name: Age: How long have you been developing(Coders Only)? If I choose you will you stick with us? MSN: Describe why you want to help me with my server:
Ok so thank's guy's hope to hear back from you! :) [/center]

item.title: ArmyPkz-2007RS Bringing back those good day's! *PI*
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

Name: Max Collins
Age: 15
How long have you been developing(Coders Only)?: Developing 4 years, with PI 3.
If I choose you will you stick with us?: I will as long as I’m wanted
MSN: Maxacollins@gmail.com
Describe why you want to help me with my server: I look forward to servers like this, without any fucking new 600+ cache. Anything under 2008 or 2008 I enjoy re-developing. I was just about to start my own server, but I thought why not just join a team with a base already.

Read full topic
item.source: ArmyPkz-2007RS Bringing back those good day's! *PI*

item.title: ArmyPkz-2007RS Bringing back those good day's! *PI*
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

I have no clue why people refer to what base a developer uses. Project’s fail because of a loss of dedication, not the performance of a particular base.
